name: consomme
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thin, clear soup: Do not boil too fast or the consommé will become cloudy. Maria chose the beef consomme with vegetables and dumplings.
imagenavi/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesResearch shows that a soup starter, like chicken consommé, helps us to eat less at the main course.You may make the consomme up to 3 days in advance.Pour over a little of the consomme to soften the beef and warm it.Her consommé is a clarified chicken broth prepared according to a traditional family recipe.
